title: Sterile Heart
description: Jack touched her face and wiped away the tear, only to see another roll down her other cheek.“I love you, Jack,” she said with break in her voice and a lump in her throat.Jack gave her another hug and said, “Good,” in a reassuring tone.He got into his car and drove away. Jack was free.She was just one woman in a string of women that Jack Harmon recorded through the years. He left them all in his wake with heartache. Until, he suffered the biggest heartbreak of all.
author: John Hepola
